hadiths.text: Narrated `Abdullah bin `Umar:Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) saw sputum on the wall of the mosque in the direction of the Qibla and scraped it off. He faced the people and said, "Whenever any one of you is praying, he should not spit in front of him because in the prayer Allah is in front of him

chapter.ara-name: باب حَكِّ الْبُزَاقِ بِالْيَدِ مِنَ الْمَسْجِدِ
chapter.eng-name: To scrape off the sputum from the mosque with the hand (using some tool or other, or using n tool)
